title: An introduction to left and right wing ideologies (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this student special, Matthew talks to Sociology and Politics teacher Emma Aston about the difference between left and right wing thinking. Emma explains where the terms originate from, the basic principles and then how they would differ on their attitudes towards the family, education, religion and crime.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
